You could use a [configurator](https://docs.kentico.com/x/34BwCg) to dynamically change values, properties, visibility conditions, and validation rules for a widget property. I'm not sure if this allows you to change the disabled/enabled status.
You could also add a [visibility condition](https://docs.kentico.com/developers-and-admins/development/builders/builder-component-properties-visibility-and-validation#add-visibility-conditions) which could show/hide the field based on value of a preceeding property.
If those don't solve your issue then you'll need to make [a custom UI Form Component](https://docs.kentico.com/x/5ASiCQ) which could toggle between enabled/disabled using a configurator.
